Articles.Content: 559:A ban hammer in a glass case with the inscriptions : "break in case of compulsif poster" on it
560: Stairs to levels 561 and 513
561: The floor, walls and ceiling are made entirely of glass. Step carefully.

562: A man and his wife are shopping for a mattress. The man says mattress and a man puts a paper bag over his head while two other men stand in a tea chest and sing an exciting and riveting song about the manufacture of fountain pens.

Edited November 5, 2013 by Flymetothemun
Gramer
Floor 56X: A scrape-painter scrape-painted a sign. By using your conscience, you figured out you are at floor 563.
Floor 564: The floor where stuff of dreams are made - Gamestore
Floor 565 : where the rainbow tale start
Floor 566, Where the rainbow tale ends, along with hope
567: An open door, you realize it leads to an out-of-service elevator shaft.
You ascend to floor 568 via Levitating Cloud only to find the way up the elevator shaft upwards barred by a sheet of glass. Exiting the shaft, you see what appears to be the remains of a banquet.
Floor 568 - you see the fandom equestria
569 - an empty room except for a table with a plate of 5 cupcakes.
570 - The dark side of the fandom, with a sign with "Mirror Shade was here" on it.

571 - The room of the Corgi. upon arrival he starts asking questions about pointless topics such as "how do i make a OC" "MY IRC IS BROKEN HELP MEEEE" and "what is Mirror shade?" You quickly right down the answers and pound the shut door button before he continues on.
572: A large emancipation field covers the hallway. You walk through it unscathed.
571 - you see [insert picture here] (can we use pictures?)
572 - The pickle floor.
573 - The good pickles floor!We have all the nice stuff, not that lossey level 572 ones.
574 - No we have the good stuff here floor 573 and 572 are lieing
575- The cure for infant logic loops.

floor 576: a black hole contained in a Zero gravity chamber you walk the stairs that compensates for its gravity (that would explain why you felt lighter when you entered this building!)

ps is this a necro?

Floor 577: The roof.

Flameshield 100% Charged

Floor 577: The roof.

Flameshield 100% Charged

floor 578 wait what? i was just on the roof! whatever i guess it was a fake!
Floor 579: Space.
Floor 580: You've busted through the center of the Moon, and you're in the JumpGrav Transport system. Jump through the area between the two halves of the Moon and get pulled through!
